title: Old Tin Sorrows (Garrett Files, Bk. 4)
features: Someoneor somethingis murdering the employees of retired General Stantor. Now, this growing legion of the dead wants to add the general to their ranks. And its up to Garrett and the half-elf Morley Dotes to protect Stantor and find the killer...
description: A veteran of the Cantard War calls in a debt and hires private investigator Garrett to discover a poisoner in the household of a retired general of the Fleet Marines. A host of walking dead, a mysterious woman in white, and a ramshackle estate on the outskirts of the city of TunFaire lend a gothic feel to the latest fantasy/mystery in a series that includes Sweet Silver Blues, Bitter Gold Hearts, and Cold Copper Tears . Recommended for fantasy collections.-- JCCopyright 1989 Reed Business Information, Inc.
